meanings.definition: Relating to or operated by devices that use electricity.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new electronic gadget.
meanings.sent3: The electronic alarm clock woke me up early.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the electronic speaker.
meanings.sent5: The electronic music filled the room with energy.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of electronic equipment.
meanings.sent1: The electronic repair shop fixed my computer.
meanings.sent2: We attended an electronic music concert.
meanings.sent3: The electronic ticket saved us time at the entrance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like an electronic display.
meanings.sent5: The electronic screen displayed vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The electronic charge was measured in volts.
meanings.sent2: He studied electronic properties of materials.
meanings.sent3: The electronic experiment sparked curiosity in the students.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like electronic particles in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The electronic field influenced the movement of electrons.
